title: Ashlyn Harris and Ali Krieger on Equity and Advocacy
itunes:title: Ashlyn Harris and Ali Krieger on Equity and Advocacy
description:
Hosts Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu present a conversation Scarlet had with soccer champions Ashlyn Harris and Ali Krieger, discussing their careers, their roles as adoptive mothers and their advocacy work for maternal health, the LGBTQ community and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
